website_summaries.verdict: Thoughtfully designed jersey with catchy, colorful, and fun graphics, and anti-ride-up feature.
pros: Quick-drying jersey available in 16 colors with graphics
Soft and comfortable, with professional cycling mesh sides for breathability
Silicon anti-slip strip along bottom hem to prevent riding up
Reflective stripe on back for safety at night
cons: Like other brands of this item, sizing runs very small

customer_reviews.title: Not running small!!!
customer_reviews.text: shirt is fine. quality seems good. I read reviews that stated that the shirt ran small and recommended ordering next size up for proper fit. I followed advice and shirt is too large. I take med. and ordered Lg. I can live with this because I don't need tour de France streamlining. Order the size you usually do for proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: hugh

customer_reviews.title: Cool shirt made well.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shirt. I ordered an XL (one size up from my normal) and it fits well. I have about a 44 chest and take a 44 regular suit jacket, if that gives you any guidance on size. I'm 5'10" and about 195 lbs. Love the design and colors on this shirt. easily adds about ten miles per hour for reduced wind drag.. ha just kidding, but at least I look good as I put in my miles..
customer_reviews.author: Rob Britt

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt and colors were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very good jersey, comfortable and the colors are great. I have 6ft and 166lbs and size M was a very good fit for me, see pictures. It's not very snug on my chest, but that is high I like it, the consequence is that is will flap a little bit when you ride (see my second picture showing a gap where my arms are bended like they would be in the bike), but I still prefer like this (I just need to protect my nipples, or open the jersey, during long rides). The full zipper is great, so that you can open as much as you want to get fresh or avoid nipple rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey but if you are a serious cyclist order ...
customer_reviews.text: Great jersey but if you are a serious cyclist order the right size, do not listen to these people, I order a size large and I have room. I am 6' 170lb and ordered an extra large, I should have ordered a large. But again the quality of the jersey is great, I've ridden about 250 miles in it (my normal ride is 30-35 miles) and I have even crashed in it and it didn't get torn up...my arm did though, lol.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Size Chart Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: Love this cool cycling jersey. I am a casual rider usually riding about 15-25 mile rides usually to a cool town with a nice pub. This jersey fits great. I am 5'7" and about 168 pounds. A bit of a beer gut. I ordered the medium and it fits nice. Quality seems good for the price and it really looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: steve beppel

customer_reviews.title: Fits better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions exceed expectations for the price. 5'11", 170lbs at a probably-should-be-160 level of pudginess, t-shirt size medium, jersey size medium and it's a decently aerodynamic fit with good length in the front and back. If you look like me check out the pics and judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Smoo95

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It--Even for a Dollar
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several low-priced cycling jerseys, but this is the first one that has severely disappointed me. My first issue is with the pockets--they are extremely shallow. I've never owned a jersey with pockets that can't even hold my phone. And there's no reason for it--just start them higher on the back. But that's not the cause for the one-star review. After 2 rides--and following the washing instructions--the zipper is pretty much broken. Can I zip it all the way up? Yes, but no matter how carefully I do it, the jersey unzips from the bottom up. Pretty much ready for the bin.
customer_reviews.author: The G Man

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: A good shirt for the cost. I like the design, but not sure of the durability of it since I just got it. I am 5'8" and weigh about 150 with medium build and 31" waist. Shirt really designed for taller individuals. Will keep this, but wonder if a small would have fit better. I cannot agree with other comments about sizing up one or two sizes, but if you have a bit of a belly or a longer torso the lenght should work for you. I would just order your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: Greaet look, vibrant colors and wicks away the sweat
customer_reviews.text: Two of my favorite things as a theme, I had to have it. The colors are bright and vibrant and do not seem to be fading in the wash. I sweat A LOT, I mean like A LOT, like if I were a X-Men my mutation would be to sweat ginormous amounts of sweat to be used as slicks to slip up the bad guys or as torture scent, but this jersey wicks it away into the air so I love that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered L size but had to swap for XL. these are bit tight, I guess they're supposed to be for cycling. I have fairly athletic built, 5'10" at 200lb, normally wear L but XL is sometimes needed.. The XL fits well. I like them for what they are, wish one of the back pockets was zippered however. Other than that this is nicely designed shirt, material is ok, nothing special, polyester stretching material. Definitely more of a daily shirt then one to use for longer rides. I got 2 different design ones, and both have same quality and fit. Would recommend to anyone for daily use or something cheaper to try for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa ann

customer_reviews.title: Best performing jersey I’ve ever worn, but size up one!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, having worked in bike shops for years and knowing what a good jersey is, this is right up there with some expensive brands. Performance is top notch, the designs are awesome and they fit great! Zipper is nicer than all other jerseys I own. Tail grips your shorts right. Sleeve length is perfect. I wear a L or XL t-shirt, but had to go with a XXL for fit. I don’t wear them skin right but I do wear them super snug. I’m 6’2” and 210 with a 44” chest for reference. I bought a few others as well. Cool designs, built really well, and awesome performance for any price!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money, but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I like the graphics and the shirts are very light weight. The quality of the elastic seems good. The fabric is a little thinner than other bike shirts I have from more expensive brands. The only thing I'll say is it said fit as expected in 71% of the reviews, so I ordered my normal size (L) but I think perhaps I should have ordered XL as the shirts are very tight. I'll probably keep them (I ordered 2 different designs) but if I were to order again I might err on one size larger than your typical size.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cycling Jersey that Fits Right
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough good things about this jersey. It is beautiful and seems to be made of high quality materials. As far as how it fits, I normally wear a large t shirt and I ordered an X large jersey. I am 5"-6" / 167.64 Centimeters tall and weigh 195 lbs / 88.4505 Kilograms. The jersey fits perfectly. It fits close the skin without being too tight. The sleeves fit snug without causing discomfort. I will definitely be buying another in a different pattern to alternate between ride days. I think if you order a size above what you would normally wear in a t shirt you will be happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: KarpeTech

customer_reviews.title: great fit and breathable fabric
customer_reviews.text: This jersey is great for hot summer rides. I got the print with the astronaut and balloon planets and the colors pop out very nicely. The pictures are pretty accurate to the product I got, in terms of colors. I've bought 2 jersey's from this company so far and both fit fantastic. The elastic on the bottom is grippy and fits well, and the pockets are deep enough for the things I carry. The pockets aren't super deep, so don't expect to pack tons of stuff in them, but they're great for a couple of snacks, phone, gloves, smaller things like that.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisPFries

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cycling jersey. The zip is not quite as big and robust as the jersey I spent 75 dollars on at the local bike shop. But at this price, that is completely acceptable. It looks good and feels comfortable. I don't understand the idea that a bike jersey is more comfortable when it is loose. Having the wind whip the material of your shirt against your skin for the length of your ride does not equal "comfortable." This jersey is nice and form fitting and looks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Deardon

customer_reviews.title: Great value- be careful of length shrinkage taller people!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and zipper are decent and jersey is very breathable. Fit as a woman with curves is about what you’d expect out of a men’s jersey- tight around the waist. I have fairly broad shoulders and large biceps, so the chest and shoulders fit just fine. I purchased a large and typically wear a women’s XL in non cycling clothes. I loved the design, and while it shrunk somewhat in the wash (even tho line dried/cold wash), it was mostly in length. The length shrink may be too much for longer torso men. Overall a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Vlasak

customer_reviews.title: Incredible jersey and price point
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of jerseys I’ve use throughout 26 years of bicycle riding. I thought I would try this line of colorful jerseys for myself and to my surprise they are excellent in all respects. So nice that I now own several and have become my favorite even over the ones I paid 3 to 4 times more for.. Material, stitching and zippers are great.
customer_reviews.author: GJL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these jerseys! Bought another one after riding my first one a few times. I bought my typical size and it fits great. 6'1" 190lbs went with a Large. I've had a different brand of jersey run way small, this jersey seems to be true size. Great cooling material, I ride in Florida summers and they can be brutal. Zipper is smooth and doesnt get jammed like some of my other jerseys. All in all a great price for a great jersey. I'll be buying more when I need them. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely printed and sewn.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: OK, so this is not one of those $90+ jerseys you see in the bike shop, but it is very good value. It fits a little snug around the middle. As other reviewers have commented, the pockets are a little too shallow. My new iPhone SE just pokes out the top . . . Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: great value! I love these jerseys, and they fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome jersey. Love the subtle but fun graphics, and after several dozen wash cycles, it doesn't seem to have worn out or shrunk to any noticeable degree. For what I paid, this was a great value and I'll be shopping for more jerseys for next year. The ones I've gotten already seem to still be standing the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Bania

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! Wore this during an Ironman.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this jersey while riding the bike portion of the Augusta Ironman this year because the available team tri kit was a bit too snug. I’m more of a Clydesdale level rider, and I needed a jersey that was normal American sizing, and this jersey did the trick. I tried many others, and most of them were too small, but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Teachey

customer_reviews.title: Cycling Jersey
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an extra large regular shirt but, for cycling I have to wear an XXL because of the tight fit. This jersey was still too small in an XXL size so I gave it to my son who ears a large and it fit him just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Not for riders with big chests
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 3XL. I am 6 ft. tall and the length of this cool-looking jersey is great, but the chest and torso are snug. I weigh 218lb.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear small T-shirts so I ordered a Medium, but it still fits tight. Not only that, upon arrival the shirt smelled HEAVILY of body odor. The collar is also wrinkled already, as if it's been used multiple times before. This is obviously not a new shirt. I washed it once and the smell came out, so I kept it. But that was definitely not a good impression. If you're going to re-use products, at least wash them first.
customer_reviews.author: Wulfrik

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great design & quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 feet tall, 165 lbs. ordered Medium size. I had not found any brands/ styles that me fit well. After reading the reviews and determining my size, I ordered 3 jerseys and they arrived earlier than promised. They fit extremely well and seem to be of good quality. I’ve used them on 2 rides so far and I love them. I just ordered a few more in other colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s a men’s shirt, but it fits me just great. I bought a medium and I’m a women’s 8-10. It just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne B

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cycling Jersey!!
customer_reviews.text: To start off I had to return the large jersey size, it was too tight. The XL one I received 2 days later fit Great. I'm 6" 2" with a weight between 180-185 lbs. The jersey fits very nice, very much a sport tight cut. I probably will buy another one as a back-up for later times. I've washed it twice so far and it seems fine. Great jersey for the price. The only negative is I wish the pockets were deeper for those longer rides.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: OK but... be carefull with Chinees sizes.
customer_reviews.text: All good except size. I order Large as is what i buy in the US... and after reading some reviews saying is true for size. But --- this large size is a small US size. I should have asked for XL or even XXL.
customer_reviews.author: zaspi

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this jersey. I wasn't sure what I was going to get, but the sizing/fit, material and stitching all seem to be quality. My only concern is the plastic zipper, we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: W. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight.  Weird Cut.
customer_reviews.text: RETURNED> This jersey was WAY too tight and a weird cut. Even after cramming my thin arms through the arm holes and zippered up... It was too tight in all the wrong places. Cheap fabric. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: order one size up
customer_reviews.text: order one size up, I wear a large and the xtra large fit, it's a little big...I like that better than a little small........this is a good looking well made Jersey I have many with a full zipper do not unzip it all the way it is very difficult to zip it up again
customer_reviews.author: E. Money

customer_reviews.title: I love MR Strgao Bike & Donuts
customer_reviews.text: My favorite jersey out of all the jerseys I have purchased from Amazon. It looks exactly like the picture. I get a lot nice comments from fellow cyclists. Fits true to size. Order according to the size chart. 5 out of 5 stars for comfort, value and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: DP726

customer_reviews.title: Good riding jersey for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got a large. I am 5'10" 178 lbs. athletic/muscular build and my other jersey is a medium but I got the large based on recommendations from reviews and the size chart. Large was the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jnmugno

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine. Order the indicated size.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a chance to ride in it yet (arrived just now), but I wanted to say that it fits like a jersey should. I’m 5’8” and 156lbs, athletic build and medium is perfect. Ignore the size up recommendations, unless you want a loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shirt, bought 1 size bigger which worked out. My only negative and reason for four stars is the back pockets are swallow, can't put my stuff in them scared it will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke A Moree

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am used to spending $100 or more for my cycling kits. Went out on a limb and took a chance on these. I'll never spend a lot of money every again for kit. It's good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Great graphic
customer_reviews.text: Very fun graphic, especially for a crazy hill climber like me. Kind of reminds me of those vintage ski posters. Beware that it is not an ultra light weight material. It is too heavy for really hot days. It zips "Europe" side if that bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: Cut Co2

customer_reviews.title: WAY Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This jersey doesn't even come close to fitting anyone over 6'. I'm 6'4", but I don't think chopping off 4 inches would help. It's like it was made for a small woman.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Size runs way small even using their size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Used their size chart. Ordered a 3x (48" chest). Couldn't zip it up. These companies need to get their sizes correct. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: tom lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey
customer_reviews.text: Great jersey especially for the price. I am 6’5” 240lb and the XXL fits great. The banding at the bottom keeps it from riding up when the pockets are empty. Perfect snug fit without being constricting. At this price even if it only lasts one season it’s worth it. Seems to be holding up well to washings so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: 3X is a 2X
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad jersey for the price, colors are good. 3X is not true to the typical North American 3XL jersey size. More like a 2X, and not much stretch to the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: pro geek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't withstand washings.
customer_reviews.text: The elastic in the collar doesn’t not maintain it’s elasticity and becomes loose around the neck after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: very nice graphics
customer_reviews.text: Graphics in full color on all 4 sides of shirt making this one super safe to spot you on the road! Very breathable and cool to wear, nicely made and easy to wash, will order more from same company. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ammons

customer_reviews.title: Want to like this more
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, light weight but the sticking quality is poor. Some how they seemed to sow over the zipper connecting both sides. I had to cut the threads, we'll see if theres any lasting effect but on first impression its not inspiring.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Young

customer_reviews.title: The worst zippers I've ever used on anything!
customer_reviews.text: I love the graphics on this Jersey. But the zippers are JUNK. I've worn this Jersey 5 or 6 times so far and every single time I have zipper issues. Tonight I went on a ride, looked down and the bottom of the jersey had started to open up. I had to pull over, completely force it to unzip, then rezip again. Terrible, terrible zippers. Not worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Bailey

customer_reviews.title: close
customer_reviews.text: a decent knockoff to expensive jerseys, I am 6;1 185 lbs the large fits well a bit snug I will get xl for MB and large for road biking
customer_reviews.author: isa espinal

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Amateur rider, first jersey purchase. But so far I am thrilled with it. I am 6’1”, 175lbs. Chest measurement is 39” so went with the suggested chart and got a Medium. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Many shirts are fitting otherwise well, but the the pockets are often incorrectly placed. This has the pockets so low, that they are super easy to use without having rubber arms.
customer_reviews.author: Esko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!  Bold graphics !!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to reading all the reviews it’s a perfect fit! Love the way it grips at the bottom of the Jersey. Super light weight, looks amazing and fit my personality 🖕🏼 Lol! I’m 6” 1” and 184lbs.. I purchased a large and it’s perfect! So glad I didn’t buy the medium. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: William lee

customer_reviews.title: Cut Really Small
customer_reviews.text: OK only because it is cut very small. I wear a L and ordered and XL just in case knowing it would probably run small. XL still too small. Maybe a 2XL would work. Great jersey if it had fit. No problem with colors or sharpness some buyers have experienced. Returning because it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great California Cycling Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Well sewn and crafted in China, remember to order at least 2 SIZES UP ... thus, if your normal U.S. size is an XL, be sure to order a 2XL or 3XL (XXL or XXXL). A U.S MEDIUM would be a Chinese XL.
customer_reviews.author: GusGus

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Typically bike jersey sells for $75 plus, so at $28, this is great. Remember to order 1 size up (especially in USA); I usually wear a M but had to return for a L.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs small. Purchased both xxl and xxxl...no bueno. Usually wear xl t shirts so I thought I was gtg. Too bad because it’s a pretty nice Jersey. Nice graphics, material feels good, construction looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shirt, wish I would of went up one more size. But I plan on using weight so it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd F

customer_reviews.title: great fit..nice styling
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I have owned. This company combines all you need plus a little design pizzaz
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: beauitful shirt and well made
customer_reviews.text: I do recommend this product, I wear an extra large tee but ordered a large because I wanted it tight knowing I will be losing more weight. yes get one a great shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bicycle jersey and my husband loves it. It fits well and lets his body breath. Nice design gets some laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Fit for taller guys
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'6" 215lbs, athletic build and the XL fits well. My measurements are 46 chest, 35 waist, 38 arms. Slightly too much material at the stomach and a little tight on the shoulders/arms but still much better than other Chinese jerseys I've bought in the past in terms of fit.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: True fit to size chart.
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding in this for over a month now, and it feels great. I'm 5'6, 175lbs. I ordered the XL because they are in Asian sizes and it fits great. Read the size chart, it seems pretty spot on to me.
customer_reviews.author: dlgraham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Jersey
customer_reviews.text: i hate spending 100 plus $'s on a cycling jersey so i thought i would purchase the Strgao jersey. So far so good, even has a good quality zipper, cool graphics to choose from, nice deep pockets, material feels good on the skin. One thing, this jersey runs a little big...not race fit...more club fit. i ordered a Large (5'10" 178 Lbs) and its a little bigger than i like, ordered another in a Medium (different graphics) and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run WAY small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design and material seemed fine, but they run 2-3 sizes too small. I ordered a 3XL and held it up to my other 3XL shirts and it looked like maybe a large.... It fit my freinds kid (14 year old) just fine.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Measure your chest and you are good to go. I am a big chested fella from weight lifting and the XXXL fit me fine.
customer_reviews.author: M and J Gordon

customer_reviews.title: One of my best bike shirts
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fits right and I like the look of it. Hold up well to frequent washing and seems to breath well while offering some wind protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Better Size Chart Please
customer_reviews.text: Jersey is way too small & the size chart isn't accurate. They need to make it easier to read in American sizes &/or too make bigger sizes for a guy who is 6'3 tall & weighs 230 lbs. I'm sending this back for a lager jersey if they have one, because I love the print/design.
customer_reviews.author: howie kaplan

customer_reviews.title: cool design, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: cool jersey, but very small.. I am 5"11" 185 lbs and wear a large in almost every jersey, but here I would need at least an x-large. Buy a size up (at least)
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Design is great. It’s a light jersey I not sure if an XL would be too big
customer_reviews.text: I wear large cycling jerseys but this was too small. Also, the stitching near the bottom extends into the zipper so it’s impossible to completely unzip this jersey. Color design is great. I’ve showed other cyclists and they like the jersey. I’m returning this jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kuty

customer_reviews.title: have 3 of these jerseys
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these jerseys. love them. im 5'7 200lbs and ordered a large. the fit is snug on me, but im planning on losing weight over the course of time. if you want something a little more loose then go one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi Shane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic zipper - broke PDQ
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed the plastic zipper broke after first use. Had to return. Liked the color and fit. Maybe I got a lemon, an edge case or outlier?
customer_reviews.author: JFig

customer_reviews.title: reasonable price for great jerseys
customer_reviews.text: Love these jerseys.. amazing price. I ordered a large initially and thought it fitted well, not tight.. but a few months later, I ordered a medium which fits a lot better.. I guess I have lost a few pounds now too...so that helps with the fitment.
customer_reviews.author: Chewchewone

customer_reviews.title: Sizing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is way off. Jersey seems to be good quality. The only down fall is the sizing to small. I had to order 2XL to fit properly. I normally wear Large in American made.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Great looking jersey but it runs very small. The three pockets in the back a nice and deep.
customer_reviews.author: Law owl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality jersey. Doesn't bunch due to the high quality silicone band on the inside bottom. Will buy more. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Dasian

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller fit
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller fit than expected but 2 sizes up. Other than that love it
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite jersey
customer_reviews.text: After going up a size, my husband loves this jersey. It fits great, he looks great, and he gets compliments from other riders. I know that’s not the point, but it’s a great design and deserves mention.
customer_reviews.author: Munker

customer_reviews.title: I love these shirts!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the shirt. It’s great value for the money. I have 6 of them already!
customer_reviews.author: Widel Velez

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the price, and one of the best pocket designs for those looking for a secure, snug carry.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: It's cool.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this jersey but right out of the bag it had a tear on the back. I was in a rush to use it in a race so I had to keep it. I used a lighter to singe the year together.
customer_reviews.author: Agent C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jersey, it is a little short if your torso is long get a larger size than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: Material is not all that great, but for the price you cannot expect any better. Did run a bit large for me. Looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: vrdumbos

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Would like a bit longer pockets. Feels like my things are close to flying off when hitting a bump on the road. Overall is great and feels good. Just follow the fit guide to get your measurements and you’re all set!
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and the quality was good, but the sizing is way off. I had to return it because the 3XL fit like a medium.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Size and price were perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price fits great. Im 5, 9 @ 225lbs have a chest of 46 inches. I got the a 2XL and it matches the size chart. Wasnt expecting it to be warm as cycle jerseys need to be breathable.
customer_reviews.author: sinem

customer_reviews.title: Might Have Been Nice If It Wasn’t So Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very, very small. I bought a Large and it only made it 3/4 of the way around my body.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: I Put This On And Started Vaping And Wearing A Flat-Billed Hat
customer_reviews.text: This product does tend to run a little small, so don't be afraid to order the next size up. Other than that, it wicks moisture away, has a full zipper (which can be finicky), and comes in cool designs.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Solid Training Jersey
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a pretty good jersey for when you're out and about training. The material is reasonably breathable and doesn't irritate my skin at all on longer rides.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Lenz

customer_reviews.title: decent jersey for the price
customer_reviews.text: good jersey for the price. will probably purchase a couple when it comes time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Childers

customer_reviews.title: These shirts run really, really small
customer_reviews.text: I', 5' 10" and around 190lbs. I purchased the XL and it is really, really small on me. These clearly aren't designed for anyone over 175lb.
customer_reviews.author: Ornithocheirus

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I dig it, because the donuts are as round as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - Recommend size up
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shirt but the medium fit like a small. Returning and ordering one in a large.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Carter

customer_reviews.title: Size warning
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, breathable material. But much smaller fit than expected. Order 2-3 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike jersey for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as the $90 bike jersey's for sale at your local book store. Zipper seems to be a bit more sturdy than those offered on a lot of the European jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: rjmandskm

customer_reviews.title: runs true to size for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have to go against grain of all the other reviews, I am a hair under 6' 1 210lbs and athletic build and I normally wear a XL and due to all the views warning how small it ran I bought a 2XL and it is FAR TOO BIG, I should have got an XL and maybe could fit into a Lg. The Shoulders and arms are good but the shirt is super long and baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Casey J. Dzimiela

customer_reviews.title: Nice jersey
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cool design. Ordered larger than recommended. Fits perfectly. I didn't want it to be skin tight. Not that much of a narcissist.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cycle shirt
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shirt. Fits well and love the design. Material wicks away moisture. Quick delivery and no issues whatsoever. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jersey.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Perfect fit. Been washed couple of times with no problems. I would purchase more Jerseys' from their store.
customer_reviews.author: dascanner

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and the fit is prefect. I could not have been more happy with the purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cheap, but not the most breathable nor great at wicking sweat (but not bad either).
customer_reviews.author: DaytonW

customer_reviews.title: Great buy go big for a loose fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Jersey. I’ve worn it a half dozen or so times now and I’m very happy with the quality and fit. I didn’t want a tight fit and have been disappointed with sizing of other products. I went 3XL and I’m glad I went overboard, typically an XL in a comfortable fitting T-shirt. I bought 2 styles and both are show no signs of falling apart. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tad on the loose side... I should have ordered a size down. But looks good and fits well. Certainly a great jersey for the price.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: I liked it until the zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a quality jersey but the zipper broke while riding, one day after the return window closed. I have some cycling jerseys over 10 years old so this is a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: John in Richmond

product_meta.title: MR Strgao Men's Cycling Jersey Bike Short Sleeve Shirt
product_meta.description:
SIZE TIPS:Please See The Size for the Recommended Size Based on Chest Inches for Strgao Bike Shirts.
Full Zipper Front - Easy to Wear and Take Off. Perfect for Cycling Riding Racing or Camping Outdoor sports.
Professional Cycling Mesh Fabrics on the Side of the Jersey to Let You Feel at Ease While Cycling, Quick Dry, Keep Away Sweat and Let You Feel Good Even Long Distance Ride; More Soft.
Silicon Anti-Slip Strip at the Bottom to Prevent Gliding up,Reflective Stripe on the Back Make You Safe Riding at Night,3D Anatomical Cutting Design,Sublimation printing technology bright color.
Lightweight but Durable:Made with Lightweight but Quality Material and with Good Stitching and Workmanship. Suitable for kinds of Outdoor Sports.
